g.text: Design a Student class with private getInfo()
1. Initialize word array and guessed letters set
2. While attempts > 0 and word not complete: get guess, update display
3. Check win/lose conditions and display result
• Use appropriate data structures for each problem
• Implement proper error handling and validation
• Choose efficient algorithms for large datasets
• Use built-in Python data structures when appropriate
• Implement caching for frequently accessed data
• Test edge cases and error conditions
• Practical application of theoretical concepts • Problem-solving and algorithm design skills
• Understanding of real-world software development • Experience with debugging and optimization
• Collaborative development practices • Documentation and presentation skills
